channel.title: Make money on fishing and cooking?
channel.description: So right now I'm trying to get my fishing level up by fishing lobs and swords/tuna. Right now I could sell everything I fished for X amount of gp. However if I decide to cook the food and then sell it, I will make less gp than X because cooked food is worth less than raw food and also I'd burn some. Basically, is there a way for me to sell my raw fish, then buy ingredients to cook with that will give me fast xp and more money than if I were to cook the fish?

item.source: Make money on fishing and cooking?

item.title: Make money on fishing and cooking?
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

RuneScape

Grand Exchange - Search Results

Looking to buy and sell in Gielinor? Check out the Grand Exchange marketplace to find the current market movers, prices, and most traded items.

Shouldn’t loose that much with sharks, in fact you could pull of making a profit now the trade limit has gone (just cooking them).

chrisn2323:

So right now I’m trying to get my fishing level up by fishing lobs and swords/tuna. Right now I could sell everything I fished for X amount of gp. However if I decide to cook the food and then sell it, I will make less gp than X because cooked food is worth less than raw food and also I’d burn some. Basically, is there a way for me to sell my raw fish, then buy ingredients to cook with that will give me fast xp and more money than if I were to cook the fish?

I just noticed

RuneScape

Grand Exchange - Search Results

Looking to buy and sell in Gielinor? Check out the Grand Exchange marketplace to find the current market movers, prices, and most traded items.

Raw/cooked are both 68gp, maybe try that in the GE? You wouldn’t make anything, but you wouldn’t loose anything either. Another way which I’ve quickly thought of is that you could keep the raw tuna then get the following items:

potato - 35gp in GE, 11gp shop price
bucket of milk - 52gp in GE, 12gp shop price
sweetcorn - GE 25 coins
raw tuna: 68gp GE (but you’ve fished that)

Then you can make tuna potato, make a profit and gain cooking XP. Profit should be around 921gp per potato, and 309.5 XP all together. I’m pretty sure they sell? So you’re gaining cooking/fishing levels and making gp + pretty good XP.

Read full topic

[quote=“chrisn2323, post:1, topic:405936”]So right now I’m trying to get my fishing level up by fishing lobs and swords/tuna. Right now I could sell everything I fished for X amount of gp. However if I decide to cook the food and then sell it, I will make less gp than X because cooked food is worth less than raw food and also I’d burn some. Basically, is there a way for me to sell my raw fish, then buy ingredients to cook with that will give me fast xp and more money than if I were to cook the fish?[/quote]In total i made 6m or so getting 99 cooking. Loss up until 95, then profit 95-99. I bought all that fish, but prices might be different now, look it up yourself!
